sources.title: That Lady in Ermine (1948)
sources.description: Circa 1861, Angelina, ruling countess of an Italian principality, is at a loss when invaded by a Hungarian army. Her lookalike ancestress Francesca, who saved a similar situation 300 years before, comes to life from a portrait to help her descendant. Complicating factor: the newlywed countess feels strangely drawn to the handsome invader... Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/that-lady-in-ermine-1948/

metadata.Plot: Circa 1861, Angelina, ruling countess of an Italian principality, is at a loss when invaded by a Hungarian army. Her lookalike ancestress Francesca, who saved a similar situation 300 years before, comes to life from a portrait to help her descendant. Complicating factor: the newlywed countess feels strangely drawn to the handsome invader...
metadata.Writer: Samson Raphaelson, Rudolph Schanzer, Ernst Welisch
metadata.Actors: Betty Grable, Douglas Fairbanks Jr., Cesar Romero
